questions.question: How do I get started with KaraX?
questions.answer: Sign up for an account and follow our onboarding guide to set up your first meeting.

questions.question: What integrations are supported?
questions.answer: We support Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, and many calendar applications.

questions.question: How accurate is the transcription?
questions.answer: Our AI achieves 95%+ accuracy and continuously improves with machine learning.

questions.question: Can I export my meeting data?
questions.answer: Yes, you can export transcripts, summaries, and action items in multiple formats.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and comply with GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC 2 standards.
